TextEng: "Someone who I'd enjoy killing?"
"Enough with this. Why are you here?"
"My name is <FirstName>."
"I might consider such an alliance..."
Text: 그런 동맹을 고려해 볼 수도 있겠군...

TextEng: "I would rather send you to the Nine Hells!"
"I am not interested."
"Perhaps you are right..."
"Forget it! I would rather die than aid you."
"Betray the rebels? I cannot do that."
"I need some kind of immediate reward if we're going to be allies."
"No... I've decided I'd really rather just kill you."
Text: 아니... 그냥 널 죽이는 게 낫겠다고 결정했어.

TextEng: "Very well. You have yourself an ally."
"Not good enough, sorry."
"I would prefer something else."
"Maybe the robe was good enough, after all."
"I would gladly do this, but I am under a geas to fight you."
Text: 기꺼이 그러겠지만, 너와 싸우라는 기아스에 묶여 있어.

TextEng: "You can remove the geas? Then what are we waiting for?!"
Text: 기아스를 풀 수 있다고? 그럼 뭘 기다려?!

TextEng: "You think you are attractive to me? Don't be foolish."
Text: 내가 너한테 끌린다고 생각해? 어리석은 소리 마.

TextEng: "Sorry, but you just aren't my type."
"I seem to be doing pretty well so far."
Text: 지금까지 꽤 잘하고 있는 것 같은데.

TextEng: "Betray my friends? Betray the Seer and the rebels?"
"I could never work with such as you!"
Text: 너 같은 자와는 절대 함께할 수 없어!

TextEng: "You and I working together? Are you joking?"
"I'd rather you were at *my* side."
Text: 차라리 네가 *내* 편에 서는 게 낫겠어.

TextEng: "Call me whatever you wish. I don't care."
"What does that mean, exactly?"
"Give me your name first. I understand 'Valsharess' is only a title."
Text: 먼저 네 이름을 알려줘. '발샤레스'는 칭호일 뿐이라고 알고 있어.

TextEng: "Good. Now tell me why you are here."
Text: 좋아. 이제 왜 여기 있는지 말해.

TextEng: "And you can call me your enemy."
Text: 그리고 날 네 적이라고 불러도 돼.

TextEng: "And I am <FullName>."
"One fine looking drow, if I might say so."
Text: 내가 말해도 된다면, 꽤 멋진 드로우인데.

TextEng: "It... it isn't Lolth herself, is it?!"
"You must be the Valsharess."
"What is this? How did you get in here!?"
Text: 이게 뭐야? 어떻게 여기 들어온 거야!?
